summary: Klip that queries vim.sf.net for recent scripts
name: Vim-klip-for-Serence-Klipfolio-Windows
description: For vim script lovers like myself who like to stay updated on the recently released vim scripts. Requires the (windows-only) klipfolio application from Serence.com. This klip is also avialable at: http://www.klipfarm.com/farm.php?page=info&klip=4122
